this new LP over here seems like the
only album in the band's discography
where they're not just playing some kind

and reject they do anything that might
sound the least bit musical rejections
sound is a spiraling hell storm of grimy

claustrophobic drums and vocals the
screech scream gargle gurgle roar make
just about every horrific sound you

like every piece of instrumentation in
the mix on this record isn't so much

cheering for the moment where they just

occasionally the guitars and the drums

about this album is for a band that
music that is so extreme revenge
certainly takes pride in its long game
typically when a band indulges in music

consistently writes tracks that are
three four six minutes long it's like
these tracks are an endurance test not

and I feel like writing longer songs

it's not the same noise if you give a

it's like different flavors of a barrage

doesn't seem so much as interested in
